oai_dc:dc.dc:title: PREDICTION OF WAVE FORCE ACTING ON HORIZONTAL PLATE
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Araki, Susumu
Deguchi, Ichiro
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: wave force
wave pressure
horizontal plate
bridge
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The applicability of the existing prediction methods of the wave force acting on a horizontal plate above the still water level is investigated by comparing the estimated wave force with the measured wave force. The applicability of a numerical model as well as the equations from experimental results is investigated. Some prediction methods overestimate the measured wave force, and some prediction methods underestimate the measured wave force.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Coastal Engineering Proceedings; No. 33 (2012): Proceedings of 33rd Conference on Coastal Engineering, Santander, Spain, 2012; structures.52
